text: Andreyevskoy is a borough in Shakhovskoy District, Moscow Oblast, Russia. Peasant writer Sergey Semyonov was born in the village of Andreyevskoy. In 1905–06, Andreyevskoy was part of the short-lived peasant Markovo Republic.Figes, Orlando: A People's Tragedy: The Russian Revolution 1891–1924. The Bodley Head, London (2014). p. 183 ==References== Category:Shakhovskoy District
title: Andreyevskoy (Shakhovskoy District)
